<ball>.name: ball
<ball>.info: A cheerful animated raccoon with large, expressive eyes and a playful expression stands in a vibrant forest setting.

<monster>.name: monster
<monster>.info: A curious animated creature with large eyes and pointed ears approaches a melting candle, its hand hovering over the flame.

<monster_toy>.name: monster_toy
<monster_toy>.info: A playful red plush toy with googly eyes and a cheerful expression sits on a computer monitor in a modern office setting, adding a touch of whimsy to the workspace.

<sloth>.name: sloth
<sloth>.info: A plush sloth toy sits on a concrete ledge by a waterfront, with a cityscape and trees in the background.

<plush>.name: plush
<plush>.info: A plush toy with a red, star-shaped body and blue eyes, featuring the 'Paris 2024' logo and Olympic rings, along with patriotic details on its feet.

<teddy>.name: teddy
<teddy>.info: A cozy, well-loved teddy bear sits on a rustic wooden bench, surrounded by greenery, evoking a sense of nostalgia and comfort.

<otter>.name: otter
<otter>.info: An animated otter enjoys a thrilling ride on a surfboard, wearing a life vest and smiling with excitement against a backdrop of turquoise waters and lush greenery.
